author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA BECOMES THE FIRST NAMED STORM OF THE SEASON IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
summary: ...IONA BECOMES THE FIRST NAMED STORM OF THE SEASON IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 5:00 PM HST Sun Jul 27 the center of Iona was located near 10.9, -148.3 with movement W at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA BECOMES THE FIRST NAMED STORM OF THE SEASON IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 5:00 PM HST Sun Jul 27 the center of Iona was located near 10.9, -148.3 with movement W at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Iona (CP1/CP012025)
